sentences: These meetings (7-12 April 2014, Berlin, Germany), finalized the WGIII contribution to AR5: 'Climate Change 2014: Mitigation of Climate Change'.
The Panel then approved the WGII SPM and accepted the underlying report, including the Technical Summary and annexes.
The Panel also discussed, inter alia , future work of the IPCC and COI.
The first meeting of the TGF met on 6 April.
enb_long_title: Fortieth session of the Intergovernmental Panel on Climate Change (IPCC-40)
